attributes.action: Make teaching CPR & basic first aid compulsory in all Secondary Schools.
attributes.additional_details: Please support this campaign by signing & sharing this petition, you can also help by writing to your MP to ask for their support...Lets teach our children the basic life saving skills that they will have throughout adulthood.
attributes.background: If more people knew how to perform CPR & basic first aid, potentially thousands of lives could be saved every year; We cant make adults learn it but can & should educate our youth.
